# planetscale_database_default_branch (Data Source)

DatabaseDefaultBranch DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "planetscale_database_default_branch" "my_databasedefaultbranch" {
  database     = "...my_database..."
  organization = "...my_organization..."
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `database` (String) The name of the database
- `organization` (String) The name of the organization the database belongs to

### Read-Only

- `branch` (String) The default branch of the database
